4.6 Qualitative segmentation examples for the fine-tuned BCE + IoU model.
Each strip displays the masked RGB input, ground-truth mask, and
model prediction (left − →right). From early to late epochs the network
eliminates most false positives and recovers small vessels, converging to
the behavior quantified in Table 4.2. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 39
5.1 Typical failure modes on held-out validation patches. Each triplet dis-
plays, from left to right, the RGB input, ground-truth mask, and model
prediction. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 46
